Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: CATCRAW
Reviews.Content: Purchased this Asus Laptop as it seemed to be an excellent configuration for the price.  Mine came with 8GB and not the 6GB listed.  Screen is nice and bright, It is speedy and easy to use.  Setup was a breeze.  The keyboard has a really nice touch.  Not liking the Windows 8 all that much so I installed "Classic Shell" and it made it much easier to use and gives me time to play with Windows 8 when I have time.  Great Value for the price.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Mira
Reviews.Content: I bought an option with 6GB RAM, and so far it is doing good. GrAphics are good, speed is satisfactory. Battery life is less than I expected tough, realistically it lasts for about 3,5 hours. W8 is a bit annoying to get used to, but performance of this configuration is pretty good. The only downside are speakers that are really bad, but thats expected in laptops, and is a small price to pay for configuration as good as this one.

Reviews.Title: Asus K55A computer-Great buy but need time to get used to windows
Reviews.Author: ggyghhhygg
Reviews.Content: Really like my computer however it took a while to get used to the new windows 8.  I like it but it is different and has a few quirks to get through but I figured it out.

Reviews.Title: This computer is definitely perfect for me!
Reviews.Author: AR904
Reviews.Content: i love this computer. This however does not come with the Accidental Damage Protection (which Asus told me it did so be careful. You will need a serial number to know for sure) but I spoke with the owner of the place I bought it from and he was AMAZING! He helped me so much and was really great! I would have to say I do not like Windows 8 that much though. I definitely prefer the previous Windows much better but I guess this is the future. The computer always jumps around to the start screen when I am in the middle of stuff so it is hard to like an operating system that so clearly has a mind of its own. BUT the seller advertised Windows 8 so I cant dock them points because they held up their end of the bargain.

Reviews.Title: Smooth Sailing!!
Reviews.Author: Waldo
Reviews.Content: Quick shipment from supplier was excellent.  The machine is the perfect size w/good speed.  The only dislike was that the unit came with Windows 8 and upgrading was a major PAIN. Also, speakers are not very strong.  But as a whole, very satisfied with the laptop and the overall buying experience!

ProductInfo.Features:
Windows 8
15.6" HD LED-backlit display
Intel Core i5-3210M processor
750GB hard drive
6GB DDR3 SDRAM system memory
ProductInfo.Name: Asus K55A-RHI5N13 Intel Core i5-3210M, 6GB, 750GB, SuperMulti DVDRW Wireless, 15.6" HD, Webcam, Windows 8
